name: Robot Runaways
description:
Hello!

NOTE: the build of the game does not launch for everyone who has tested it, the source code is avaliable if you really want to try it.

This game was barely thrown together at the literal very last second. Gameplay is bound to be buggy and almost pointless. This game is designed for the Oculus Rift + Touch (Sorry vive users). It may work on the vive, I honestly have no idea.

Shoot robots before they shoot you! If they shoot you, nothing happens, because that makes total sense. If you shoot them, they die. Try to kill all the robots without getting hit, and you will gain an immense feeling of satisfaction. Trust me.

Controls:

A and X: Teleport around, and have a great time!
B: Reload your gun, and shoot more robots!
Right trigger: Blast those robots to pieces with your gun.
Joystick: Rotate left and right, because why not.
Y: Teleport dash forward, with cool sound effects! Use this to try to avoid the robots.

I hope you enjoy this 20 seconds of gameplay thrown together in a few hours :D
